text: ```Python 4.0, codename "ouroboros: the snake will eat itself"```

elements.text: Python 4.0, codename "ouroboros: the snake will eat itself"

text:
> After heated debate on the mailing list, the 79-character line limit prescribed by PEP8 will be updated. IDE users all over the world will now be able to take advantage of their 30" ultra-wide 4K monitors, as the recommended line length will be increased to 89.5 characters (this was a compromise with the 100-character lobby, the decision being to split the difference).
this is amazing

elements.text: After heated debate on the mailing list, the 79-character line limit prescribed by PEP8 will be updated. IDE users all over the world will now be able to take advantage of their 30" ultra-wide 4K monitors, as the recommended line length will be increased to 89.5 characters (this was a compromise with the 100-character lobby, the decision being to split the difference).
